inspirational.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspirational.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
inspirational.author: Joseph Campbell

inspirational.quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
inspirational.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspirational.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
inspirational.author: Albert Einstein

inspirational.quote: You have to be lucky to be successful, but luck can be engineered.
inspirational.author: Zat Rana

inspirational.quote: It all starts and ends in the mind. The most crucial skill is how you think.
inspirational.author: Zat Rana

inspirational.quote: Accept responsibly for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
inspirational.author: Les Brown

inspirational.quote: You cannot plough a field by turning it over in your mind.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.quote: The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum.
inspirational.author: Frances E. Willard

inspirational.quote: Believe with all of your heat that you will do what you were made to do.
inspirational.author: Orison Swett Marden

inspirational.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
inspirational.author: William B. Sprague

inspirational.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
inspirational.author: Holly Near

inspirational.quote: Good things come to those who wait but greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
inspirational.author: Jesus

inspirational.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing and that is why we recommend it daily.
inspirational.author: Zig Ziglar

inspirational.quote: I can, therefore I am.
inspirational.author: Simone Weil

inspirational.quote: I’ve found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
inspirational.author: Brian Tracy

inspirational.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
inspirational.author: George S. Patton

inspirational.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
inspirational.author: Albert Camus

inspirational.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
inspirational.author: Mark Caine

inspirational.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
inspirational.author: Amelia Earhart

inspirational.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
inspirational.author: William James

motivational.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
motivational.author: Charles Kingsleigh

motivational.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

motivational.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
motivational.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

motivational.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational.author: Sam Levenson

motivational.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
motivational.author: Chris Grosser

motivational.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
motivational.author: Alan Kay

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
motivational.author: Michael Jordan

motivational.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
motivational.author: Maya Angelou

motivational.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
motivational.author: William James

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
motivational.author: George Addair

motivational.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

encouragement.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
encouragement.author: Les Brown

encouragement.quote: Challenges are what make life interested and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
encouragement.author: Joshua J. Marine

encouragement.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
encouragement.author: Leonardo da Vinci

encouragement.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
encouragement.author: Arthur Ashe

encouragement.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
encouragement.author: Dalai Lama

encouragement.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
encouragement.author: Tony Robbins

encouragement.quote: If you are offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
encouragement.author: Sheryl Sandberg

encouragement.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
encouragement.author: Henry Ford

encouragement.quote: Accept responsibly for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
encouragement.author: Les Brown

encouragement.quote: You cannot plough a field by turning it over in your mind.
encouragement.author: Anonymous

encouragement.quote: The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum.
encouragement.author: Frances E. Willard

encouragement.quote: Believe with all of your heat that you will do what you were made to do.
encouragement.author: Orison Swett Marden

encouragement.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
encouragement.author: William B. Sprague

encouragement.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
encouragement.author: Holly Near

encouragement.quote: Good things come to those who wait but greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
encouragement.author: Anonymous

encouragement.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
encouragement.author: Jesus

encouragement.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing and that is why we recommend it daily.
encouragement.author: Zig Ziglar

encouragement.quote: I can, therefore I am.
encouragement.author: Simone Weil

encouragement.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
encouragement.author: Amelia Earhart

encouragement.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
encouragement.author: William James

encouragement.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
encouragement.author: John Burroughs

encouragement.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed – there’s so little competition.
encouragement.author: Elbert Hubbard

encouragement.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
encouragement.author: Napoleon Hill

encouragement.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
encouragement.author: John F. Kennedy

encouragement.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
encouragement.author: Aristotle

encouragement.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
encouragement.author: Mark Twain

encouragement.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
encouragement.author: Benjamin Franklin

encouragement.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
encouragement.author: Jim Rohn

encouragement.quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
encouragement.author: Christopher Reeve

encouragement.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
encouragement.author: Albert Einstein

encouragement.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
encouragement.author: Winston Churchill

encouragement.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
encouragement.author: Warren Buffett

encouragement.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
encouragement.author: Dr. Seuss

encouragement.quote: Life is short, and it is here to be lived.
encouragement.author: Kate Winslet

encouragement.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backward...This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
encouragement.author: Steve Jobs

encouragement.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
encouragement.author: Pablo Picasso

encouragement.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it.
encouragement.author: Charles F. Kettering

life lessons.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
life lessons.author: Lao Tzu

life lessons.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
life lessons.author: Steve Jobs

life lessons.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
life lessons.author: Steve Jobs

life lessons.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
life lessons.author: Frank Sinatra

life lessons.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life lessons.author: John Lennon

life lessons.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
life lessons.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life lessons.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
life lessons.author: Muhammad Ali

life lessons.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
life lessons.author: Wayne Gretzky

life lessons.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
life lessons.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

life lessons.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
life lessons.author: Robert Frost

life lessons.quote: We do not remember days; we remember moments.
life lessons.author: Cesare Pavese

life lessons.quote: The best way out is always through.
life lessons.author: Robert Frost

life lessons.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life lessons.author: Confucius

life lessons.quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning how to dance in the rain.
life lessons.author: Vivian Greene

life lessons.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
life lessons.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

life lessons.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
life lessons.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life lessons.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
life lessons.author: Maya Angelou

life lessons.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
life lessons.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
